FuncDef: The local-bill cfcard reset command clears all the bills in the CF card.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the CF card is fully occupied or card usage reaches a specified alarm threshold and automatic transfer of bills to a bill server fails, run the local-bill cfcard reset command to manually clear bills in the CF card.
After you run this command, all the bills in the CF card will be cleared and cannot be restored. Therefore, exercise caution when running this command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
